getLeafNodes

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLeafNodes(java.lang.String conceptCode,
                                                     java.lang.String relationContainerName,
                                                     java.lang.String association,
                                                     java.lang.String codingScheme,

                                                     org.LexGrid.LexBIG.DataModel.Collections.NameAndValueList associationQualifiers,
                                                     boolean targetToSource)
                                              throws org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
Returns list of all the leafNodes for the supplied entityCode in codingScheme , version and using supplied association. The leafNodes will be determined based on the direction of an assication (sourceToTarget OR targetToSource)

Parameters:

relationContainerName -
association -
codingScheme -
versionOrTag -

associationQualifiers -

List of leaf EntityCodes.

org.LexGrid.LexBIG.Exceptions.LBException
